name: I Followed My Rival To A Coffee Shop
name_original: I Followed My Rival To A Coffee Shop
description:
You are a journalist and your rival’s articles keep beating yours to the front page! You decide to investigate and find out how she does it, but you might learn more than you expected…

Play 3 routes, and get a different story each time! Play time is under 10 minutes, the whole game script is around 2.5k words.

Made for NaNoReNo 2023!

Disclaimer: I do not own the background images.

****Content warning below (contains spoilers):****

Murder & drugging: in one of the routes a non-player character poisons the player character
